item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: This is Elm! I found them while I was hunting this morning. I'm showing them around the village.

item desired.Name: Hank
item desired.Text: It's nice to meet you, Elm!! I'm Hank!!! I take care of the village's pigs and cows and chickens!!!!

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: It's nice to meet you too, Hank.

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: (He has a strong grip. It's almost as strong as his voice.)

item desired.Name: Hank
item desired.Text: Say, Kai! You wouldn't have happened to have seen my animal feed lying anywhere, have you??

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Your feed? No, I haven't. Has it also gone missing?

item desired.Name: Hank
item desired.Text: Yes!! I had it this morning when I was feeding Ozzy! But when I went to fetch her lunch, it was gone!!

item desired.Name: Hank
item desired.Text: I've been looking everywhere for the past hour!! And Ozzy's getting hungrier by the minute!!!

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Oh no. We can't let Oswald stay hungry! Last time she was too hungry, she...

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: Is this a bad time to ask who Ozzy is?

item desired.Name: Hank
item desired.Text: Yes!! Short for Oswald the Eighth!!!

end feed fb.Name: Elm
end feed fb.Text: (Ugh. Those trips aren't good for my stomach.)

end feed fb.Name: Hank
end feed fb.Text: Are you okay, friend??? Do you want some milk????

end feed fb.Name: Elm
end feed fb.Text: (His loud voice is actually kind of grounding.)

end feed fb.Name: Elm
end feed fb.Text: Hank, have you checked near the village entrance?

end feed fb.Name: Kai
end feed fb.Text: Another one of your cryptic intuitions?

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: By the village entrance! Elm's got a good intuition.

item returned.Name: Hank
item returned.Text: Anna must have accidentally taken it when she picked up some of my exports!!!

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: She's one of the village's traders! Handles the imports, exports, all that stuff.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: Actually, let's go meet her next! Her house is just to the left of mine.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: We'll see you later then, Hank!
